de.sciss.jcollider
Class Bus

java.lang.Object
  de.sciss.jcollider.Bus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class Bus
extends Object
implements Constants

Mimics SCLang's Bus class, that is, it's a client side representation of an audio or control bus

Version:
0.29, 17-Sep-06
Author:
Hanns Holger Rutz
Todo:
missing methods (set, setn, fill, get, getn ...)
Warning:
this is a quick direct translation from SClang which is largely untested. before all methods have been thoroughly verified, excepted some of them to be wrong or behave different than expected. what certainly works is instantiation

Constructor Detail

Bus

public Bus(Server server)
Creates an mono audio bus on the server at index 0. This does not use the server's allocators.

Parameters:
server - the Server on which the bus resides

isAudioOut

public boolean isAudioOut()
Queries whether this bus is playing audio onto the hardware audio interface channels.

Returns:
true if this bus plays audio on audible interface channels, false otherwise
